column1: #Text=The Dai Li wo n't give me any money because the kids stopped coming .
#Text=And the kids wo n't come because my zoo 's nasty and broke .
#Text=" Aang says : " What kinda animal is that ?
#Text=" Kenji says : " Oh , that 's a rabaroo .
#Text=I wish I could get her a big open prairie like she likes .
#Text=I 'd let her hop away to happiness .
#Text=" Aang says : " There 's a big open space right outside the walls of the city .
#Text=" Kenji says : " But how 're you gon na transport all these wild critters ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry , I 'm great with animals .
